Module TrabalhoTCP
Package music

Class MusicPlayer

java.lang.Object
music.MusicPlayer
public class MusicPlayer extends Object
Class of a music player that can play notes using JFugue
Author:
, nickyecen

  • Constructor Details

    • MusicPlayer

      private MusicPlayer(double volume, Instrument instrument, int octave)
      Constructs a MusicPlayer with a defined volume, Instrument and octave
      Parameters:
      volume - the volume of how loud the Note will be
      instrument - the Instrument that the Note will use
      octave - the octave in which each Note will be played

      public void changeInstrumentTo(int midiCode)
      Changes the MusicPlayer's Instrument to the Instrument of the provided midi code.
      Parameters:
      midiCode - the midi code of the Instrument to change the MusicPlayer's Instrument to
